caption.p: (a) Excitation (λ em: 720 nm) and emission (λ ex: 420 and 580 nm) spectra of Na 3AlF 6:1% Cr 3+ phosphors. The pink star labels the sharp interference light peaks typically from Xe lamp around 467 nm. (b) Time-resolved emission spectra of Na 3AlF 6:10% Cr 3+ under pulsed light excitation of 420 nm. (c) Emission spectra and (d) decay curves of Na 3AlF 6: x% Cr 3+ ( x = 1, 5, 10, 20, 40, 60, 80, 100) phosphors. The inset of (c) shows the normalized emission peaks of Na 3AlF 6: x% Cr 3+ phosphors.
